comments.body: Quote from: Mr Reporter on July 22, 2023, 08:25:10 AMhttps://www.legit.ng/people/1545179-flying-cotonou-london-costs-n374k-lady-flying-lagos-uk-costly-n19-million/Shall Naija people be travelling to Cotonou to go to UK?Mr Reporter, whoever introduced here should have given you the proper orientation. All this kind one line post nor dey allowed here. This place nor be Nairaland. Okay now as you don ask this question wetin you want make we talk. Even if na you use your leg waka come you suppose don read as other Nigerians dey post make you follow suit. I take God beg you make you improve on your post quality. Sorry if I sound too harsh.

No be so nah, because creating a single line statement literally add no value to the forum nor the person in question, and as such should be discourage.However, a better way to posting viral news is as follows1. Come up with a viral story2. Share your opinion about it, that could be of over 300 to 1000 words3. Ask the people what they feel about it (i.e To react to it)4. That's all...Note: Format for sharing viral stories
